casebody.data:
Danny Keith HOPPER, Employee
v.
Charlton L. ALLEN, Chairman, The North Carolina Industrial Commission No. 34P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Kathleen G. Sumner, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Danny Keith Hopper. Charlton L. Allen, Attorney at Law, Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, for Industrial Commission, N.C. Dawn Raynor, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jefferson Whisenant, Attorney at Law, for Lakeside Mills, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of January 2017 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
